page.title: 11TOURISM WORLD TOUR AUSTRALIA
page.content: In August 1983 the{Mansbridge family began a year-long, world-wide tour. I was 8 and my sister was 10. Of course, Mum and Dad went too! It took us five weeks to sample{Hong Kong, Singapore, {Perth, Adelaide}and{Melbourne}before we reached{Canberra}where we stayed four months. I went to Lyons Primary School. A month visiting{Brisbane, {Surfers' Paradise, Sydney}and seeing {koalas}and{kangaroos}was lovely. Next stop,{New Zealand}for 5 months. Our friends' house in{Waiake}is on the shores of one of{Auckland's}many bays. We bought a car to travel l0,000 miles around this scenic land seeing{Milford {Sound, Mt Ruapehu, Lake Taupo}and {Rotorua. }After colourful{Tahiti,}we travelled to{USA,}where we saw{Disney- {land, deserts}and the{Grand Canyon.}We ended our tour with a 3-week trip into {Arizona, Mexico}and{Colorado.
